estimateForAnonymous(String, String[]) - Method in interface com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.OryxRecommender
A version of OryxRecommender.estimatePreference(String, String) that, like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int), operates on "anonymous" users -- defined not by a previously known set of data, but data given in the request.

recommendToAnonymous(String[], int) - Method in interface com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.OryxRecommender
Computes recommendations for a user that is not known to the model yet; instead, the user's associated items are supplied to the method and it proceeds as if a user with these associated items were in the model.
recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int) - Method in interface com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.OryxRecommender
Like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], int) but allows specifying values associated with items.
recommendToAnonymous(String[], int, Rescorer) - Method in interface com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.OryxRecommender
Like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], int) but rescorer results like OryxRecommender.recommend(String, int, boolean, Rescorer).
recommendToAnonymous(String[], float[], int, Rescorer) - Method in interface com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.OryxRecommender
Like OryxRecommender.recommendToAnonymous(String[], int, Rescorer) but lets caller specify strength scores associated to each of the items.

Recommends to a group of users all at once.

removePreference(String, String) - Method in interface com.cloudera.oryx.als.common.OryxRecommender
This method will remove an item from the user's set of known items, making it eligible for recommendation again.

Rescorer - Interface in com.cloudera.oryx.als.common
Implementations of this interface can "rescore" the recommender's score for a item that is a candidate for recommendation.
